title: Taken by the Wolf Man
description: The world no longer belonged to mankind. Vampires rule the world with an iron fist.After an argument with her wicked sister, a young pureblood vampire princess is thrown into a dungeon where she meets a captured werewolf rebel.But the vengeful huge wolf man doesn't seem to want to tear her head off. Instead, he demands her nubile, virgin body and her submission...Will the proud princess escape the beast's clutches? Or will she be forever mated with the enemy? This 3,500-word short erotic story contains explicit material, including rough, taboo monster action, and a vampiress deflowered by a virile, dominant beast man.
author: Chloe Lacroix
